paid.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the past tense and past participle of pay
paid.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: paid work is work which you receive money for
paid.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: It will become increasingly difficult for those over retirement age to obtain any paid work with which to supplement their pension.
paid.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: a paid worker receives money for the work which he or she does
paid.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: 75 percent of all paid employees work in firms with less than 100 workers.
paid.translation[1].definitions[2].defin: if a tax, bill etc is paid, a payment has been made for the money that was owed
paid.translation[1].definitions[2].examp: Unless the bottles are stamped ‘duty paid’, the wine cannot be sold.
